text: Krunoslav Lovrek (born 11 September 1979) is a Croatian footballer. He currently plays for Australian A-League club Sydney FC. He plays as a striker. ==Club career== ===Sydney FC=== On 5 July 2012, Sydney FC said that Lovrek had signed a 1-year contract with them for the 2012–13 A-League season. He had his first training session with them on July 23 2012. == Club career statistics == |- |1998-2004||Zagreb||Prva HNL||124||28 |- |- |2004||Cerezo Osaka||J.
